title: Steam for Chrome OS is coming, here are which Chromebooks will be supported at first
content:
Having been confirmed by a Googler over two years ago, Chrome OS is now closer than ever to officially supporting gaming through Steam. 9to5Google has uncovered the first Chromebooks that should support playing Steam games.

more…

The post Steam for Chrome OS is coming, here are which Chromebooks will be supported at first appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Chrome OS is now closer than ever to supporting gaming through Steam; here are the first Chromebooks that should support playing games.
